title: If You Invested $1,000 In Apple Stock When It Aired Its 1984 Super Bowl Ad, Here's How Much You'd Have Now - Apple  ( NASDAQ:AAPL )
description: Super Bowl commercials come with a price tag of $7 million for Super Bowl LVII. Some of the ads will be remembered for years, while others will be easily forgotten. Here's a look at one of the most famous commercials of all-time and the potential massive fortune it made by investors.
